top_comments.comment: I'm a member of Visual Arts Gang (non-musician unfortunately),  and my favorite piece (besides Tchaikovsky's Violin Concerto ;) ) is Rachmaninoff's Isle of the Dead. I don't know if that's "underrated" or not, but I don't hear people talk about it often and I absolutely adore it- probably because I absolutely adore the painting it was inspired by.

oh gosh I've always had a soft spot for Sibelius' Le Sapin and am very happy it made it to this list! 
(also random fun fact: Mariya Takeuchi's "Whisky ga Osuki Dessho" shares (part of) a melody with Le Sapin.... a bit sus....)
TikTok videos and absurd stuff, not so much for me. But this kind of videos is why I stay subscribed to this channel.
Eddy and his love for French impressionist composers.

I'm a member of Visual Arts Gang (non-musician unfortunately),  and my favorite piece (besides Tchaikovsky's Violin Concerto ;) ) is Rachmaninoff's Isle of the Dead. I don't know if that's "underrated" or not, but I don't hear people talk about it often and I absolutely adore it- probably because I absolutely adore the painting it was inspired by.
Anybody else think they were talking about the country when they were talking about Britten😂

oh gosh I've always had a soft spot for Sibelius' Le Sapin and am very happy it made it to this list! 
(also random fun fact: Mariya Takeuchi's "Whisky ga Osuki Dessho" shares (part of) a melody with Le Sapin.... a bit sus....)
